      • PROPERTY_BORDER_COLLAPSE

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_BORDER_COLLAPSE
        Property that provides the value for the border-collapse CSS property to be applied to the table generated for the report.

        The property can be set globally and at report level. It defaults to collapse.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
